text: A lion was sleeping peacefully when a mouse ran over his body. The lion woke up and moved in all directions looking for the intruder who was bothering him. A fox was watching him, and she criticized him for believing he was afraid of a simple mouse, being a whole lion lord. "It's not the fear of the mouse", said the lion, "but I was surprised that there was an animal that would have the courage to trample on the body of a sleeping lion". Never stop taking care of yourself, even the smallest things.
title: El león, la zorra y el ratón
author: nan Esopo
